item.title: Why Hugo
item.description: Introduction Hello, and welcome to my blog! I’m very excited to share my journey of creating this website using Hugo, a fast and flexible static site generator. I always wanted to write blogs as I have a passion for writing. I never knew that setting up a blog page would be this easy. Static Site Generators (SSGs) have made it easier for many people including newbies as well as professionals in their day-to-day life.
